words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||jangan||kamu mendahului||antara||hadapan||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||dan bertakwalah||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Mendengar||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: O (you who)||(O) you who||believe||(Do) not||put (yourselves) forward||before Allah||before Allah||before Allah||and His Messenger||and fear||Allah||Indeed||Allah||(is) All-Hearer||All-Knower

translations.text: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tuqaddimoo baina yada-yil laahi Wa-Rasoolihee wattaqul laah; innal laaha samee'un 'Aleem

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||jangan||kamu meninggikan||suaramu||di atas||suara||nabi||dan jangan||kamu keraskan||kepadanya||dengan perkataan||seperti keras||sebagian kamu||terhadap sebagian||bahwa||akan hapus||amal-amal kamu||dan kalian||tidak||menyadari
words.en: O (you who)||(O) you who||believe||(Do) not||raise||your voices||above||(the) voice||(of) the Prophet||and (do) not||be loud||to him||in speech||like (the) loudness||(of) some of you||to others||lest||become worthless||your deeds||while you||(do) not||perceive

translations.text: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tarfa'ooo aswaatakum fawqa sawtin Nabiyyi Wa-laa tajharoo lahoo bilqawli kajahri ba'dikum liba-'din an tahbata a-'maalukum Wa-antum laa tash'uroon

words.id: sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||merendahkan||suara  mereka||di sisi||rasul||Allah||mereka itu||orang-orang yang||menguji||Allah||hati mereka||untuk bertakwa||bagi mereka||ampunan||dan pahala||besar
words.en: Indeed||those who||lower||their voices||(in) presence||(of the) Messenger of Allah||(of the) Messenger of Allah||those||(are) the ones||Allah has tested||Allah has tested||their hearts||for righteousness||For them||(is) forgiveness||and a reward||great

translations.text: innal lazeena yaghud-doona aswaatahum inda Rasoolil laahi ulaaa'ikal lazeenam tah-anal laahu quloobahum littaqwaa; lahum maghfiratunw wa'ajrun 'azeem

words.en: Indeed||those who||call you||from||behind||the private chambers||most of them||(do) not||understand

translations.text: innal lazeena yunaadoo-naka minw waraaa'il hujuraati aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon

words.id: dan kalau||sekiranya mereka||mereka sabar||sehingga||kamu keluar||kepada mereka||sungguh adalah||lebih baik||bagi mereka||dan Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: And if||they||had been patient||until||you came out||to them||certainly it would be||better||for them||And Allah||(is) Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Wa-law annahum sabaroo hatta takhruja ilaihim lakaana khairal lahum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||jika||datang kepadamu||orang fasik||dengan berita||maka jelaskan||agar||kamu (tidak) menimpakan||kaum||karena kebodohan/tidak tahu||maka jadilah kamu||atas||apa||perbuatanmu||orang-orang yang menyesal
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||If||comes to you||a wicked person||with information||investigate||lest||you harm||a people||in ignorance||then you become||over||what||you have done||regretful

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo in jaaa'akum faasiqum binaba-in fatabaiyanooo an tuseeboo qawmam bijahalatin fatusbihoo 'alaa maa fa'altum naadimeen

words.id: dan ketahuilah||bahwa||diantara kamu||rasul||Allah||jika||dia mentaati kamu||dalam||banyak||dari||urusan||tentu menyusahkan kamu||tetapi||Allah||menjadikan cinta||kepadamu||keimanan||dan Dia menjadikannya indah||dalam||hatimu||dan Dia menjadikan benci||kepadamu||kekafiran||dan kefasikan||dan kedurhakaan||mereka itu||mereka||orang-orang yang mengikuti jalan yang lurus
words.en: And know||that||among you||(is the) Messenger of Allah||(is the) Messenger of Allah||If||he were to obey you||in||much||of||the matter||surely you would be in difficulty||but||Allah||has endeared||to you||the Faith||and has made it pleasing||in||your hearts||and has made hateful||to you||disbelief||and defiance||and disobedience||Those||(are) they||the guided ones

translations.text: Wa'lamooo anna feekum Rasoolal laah; law yutee'ukum fee kaseerim minal amrila anittum Wa-laakinnal laaha habbaba ilaikumul eemaana Wa-zaiyanahoo fee quloobikum Wa-karraha ilaikumul kufra walfusooqa wal'isyaan; ulaaaika humur raashidoon

words.en: A Bounty||from Allah||from Allah||and favor||And Allah||(is) All-Knower||All-Wise

translations.text: Fadlam minal laahi Wa-ni'mah; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

words.id: dan jika||dua golongan||dari||orang-orang yang beriman||mereka berperang||maka damaikanlah||diantara keduanya||maka jika||berbuat aniaya||salah seorang dari keduanya||atas||yang lain||maka perangilah||yang||berbuat aniaya||sehingga||(golongan) kembali||kepada||perintah||Allah||maka jika||kembali||maka damaikanlah||diantara keduanya||dengan adil||dan berlaku adil-lah kamu||sesungguhnya||Allah||menyukai||orang-orang yang berbuat adil
words.en: And if||two parties||among||the believers||fight||then make peace||between both of them||But if||oppresses||one of them||on||the other||then fight||one which||oppresses||until||it returns||to||(the) command||(of) Allah||Then if||it returns||then make peace||between them||with justice||and act justly||Indeed||Allah||loves||those who act justly

translations.text: Wa-in taaa'ifataani minal mu'mineena naqtataloo fa-aslihoo bainahumaa; fa-im baghat ihdaahumaa 'alal ukhraa faqaatilul latee tabghee hattaa tafeee'a ilaaa amril laah; fa-in faaa'at fa-aslihoo bainahumaa bil'adli Wa-aqsitoo, innal laaha yuhibbul muqsiteen

words.id: sesungguhnya hanyalah||orang-orang yang beriman||bersaudara||maka damaikanlah||antara||kedua saudaramu||dan bertakwalah||Allah||agar kalian||kamu dirahmati
words.en: Only||the believers||(are) brothers||so make peace||between||your brothers||and fear Allah||and fear Allah||so that you may||receive mercy

translations.text: innamal mu'minoona ikhwatun fa-aslihoo baina akhawaykum wattaqul laaha la'allakum turhamoon

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||jangan||memperolok-olok||suatu kamu||dari||kaum||boleh jadi||bahwa||adalah mereka||lebih baik||dari pada mereka||dan jangan||wanita||dari||wanita||boleh jadi||bahwa||mereka adalah||lebih baik||dari mereka||dan jangan||kamu mencela||diri kalian sendiri||dan jangan||kamu panggil memanggil||dengan julukan||seburuk-buruk||nama||fasik||sesudah||keimanan||dan barang siapa||tidak||berbuat||maka mereka itu||mereka||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||(Let) not||ridicule||a people||[of]||(another) people||perhaps||that||they may be||better||than them||and (let) not||women||[of]||(other) women||perhaps||that||they may be||better||than them||And (do) not||insult||yourselves||and (do) not||call each other||by nicknames||Wretched is||the name||(of) disobedience||after||the faith||And whoever||(does) not||repent||then those||they||(are) the wrongdoers

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa yaskhar qawmum min qawmin 'asaaa aien yakoonoo khairam minhum Wa-laa nisaaa'um min nisaaa'in 'Asaaa ay yakunna khairam minhunna Wa-laa talmizooo anfusakum Wa-laa tanaabazoo bil'alqaab; bi'sal ismul fusooqu ba'dal eemaan; Wa-mal lam yatub fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||jauhilah||banyak||dari||berprasangka||sesungguhnya||sebagian||berprasangka||dosa||dan jangan||kamu mencari kesalahan||dan jangan||kamu mengumpat||sebagian kamu||sebagian||apakah kamu menyukai||salah seorang diantara kamu||bahwa||memakan||daging||saudaranya||yang mati||maka kamu jijik padanya||dan bertakwalah||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Penerima taubat||Maha Penyayang
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||Avoid||much||of||the assumption||Indeed||some||assumption||(is) sin||And (do) not||spy||and (do) not||backbite||some of you||(to) others||Would like||one of you||to||eat||(the) flesh||(of) his brother||dead||Nay, you would hate it||And fear Allah||And fear Allah||indeed||Allah||(is) Oft-Returning||Most Merciful

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanuj taniboo kaseeram minaz zanni inna ba'daz zanni ismunw Wa-laa tajassasoo Wa-la yaghtab ba'dukum ba'daa; a-yuhibbu ahadukum aien yaakula lahma akheehi maitan fakarih-tumooh; wattaqul laa; innal laaha tawwaabur Raheem

words.id: wahai||manusia||sesungguhnya Kami||Kami menciptakan Kamu||dari||laki-laki||dan perempuan||dan Kami jadikan kamu||berbangsa-bangsa||dan bersuku-suku||supaya kamu saling mengenal||sesungguhnya||paling mulia diantara kamu||di sisi||Allah||paling bertakwa diantara kamu||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Mengetahui||Maha Melihat
words.en: O mankind||O mankind||Indeed, We||created you||from||a male||and a female||and We made you||nations||and tribes||that you may know one another||Indeed||(the) most noble of you||near||Allah||(is the) most righteous of you||Indeed||Allah||(is) All-Knower||All-Aware

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu innaa khalaqnaakum min zakarinw Wa-unsaa Wa-ja'alnaakum shu'oobanw Wa-qabaaa'ila lita'aarafoo inna akramakum indal laahi atqaakum innal laaha 'Aleemun khabeer

words.id: berkata||orang-orang Arab dusun||kami telah beriman||katakanlah||belum||kamu beriman||tetapi||katakan||kami telah menyerahkan diri||dan belum||masuk||keimanan||dalam||hati kamu||dan jika||kamu taat||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||tidak||Dia mengurangi kamu||dari||amalanmu||sesuatu pun||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: Say||the Bedouins||We believe||Say||Not||you believe||but||say||We have submitted||and has not yet||entered||the faith||in||your hearts||But if||you obey||Allah||and His Messenger||not||He will deprive you||of||your deeds||anything||Indeed||Allah||(is) Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Qaalatil A'raabu aamannaa qul lam tu'minoo Wa-laakin qoolooo aslamnaa Wa-lamma yadkhulil eemaanu fee quloobikum Wa-in tutee'ul laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo laa yalitkum min a'maalikum shai'aa; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

words.id: sesungguhnya hanyalah||orang-orang mukmin||orang-orang yang||beriman||kepada Allah||dan rasul-Nya||kemudian||tidak||mereka ragu-ragu||dan mereka berjihad||dengan harta mereka||dan diri/jiwa mereka||di||jalan||Allah||mereka itu||mereka||orang-orang yang benar
words.en: Only||the believers||(are) those who||believe||in Allah||and His Messenger||then||(do) not||doubt||but strive||with their wealth||and their lives||in||(the) way||(of) Allah||Those||[they]||(are) the truthful

translations.text: innamal muu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee summa lam yartaaboo Wa-jaahadoo biamwaalihim Wa-anfusihim fee sabeelil laah; ulaaaika humus saadiqoon

words.id: katakanlah||apakah kamu akan memberitahukan||Allah||tentang agamamu||dan Allah||mengetahui||apa yang ada||di||langit(jamak)||dan apa yang ada||di||bumi||dan Allah||terhadap segala||sesuatu||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: Say||Will you acquaint||Allah||with your religion||while Allah||knows||what||(is) in||the heavens||and what||(is) in||the earth||And Allah||of every||thing||(is) All-Knower

translations.text: Qul atu'allimoonal laaha bideenikum wallaahu ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ard; wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

words.id: mereka merasa memberi nikmat||atas kamu||bahwa||mereka masuk Islam||katakan||jangan||kamu merasa memberi nikmat||atas||keislamanmu||bahkan||Allah||memberi nikmat||atas kalian||bahwa||Dia memberi petunjuk kepadamu||kepada keimanan||jika||kalian adalah||orang-orang yang benar
words.en: They consider (it) a favor||to you||that||they have accepted Islam||Say||(Do) not||consider a favor||to me||your Islam||Nay||Allah||has conferred a favor||upon you||that||He has guided you||to the faith||if||you are||truthful

translations.text: Yamunnoona alaika an aslamoo qul laa tamunnoo alaiya islaamakum balil laahu yamunnu alaikum an hadaakum lil-eemaani in kuntum saadiqeen

words.id: sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Mengetahui||kegaiban||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan Allah||Maha Melihat||terhadap apa||kamu kerjakan
words.en: Indeed||Allah||knows||(the) unseen||(of) the heavens||and the earth||And Allah||(is) All-Seer||of what||you do

translations.text: innal laaha ya'lamu ghaibas samaawaati wal-ard; wallaahu baseerum bimaa ta'maloon
